about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey through the realms of Viking Survivors, a heart-pounding action roguelite that pits you against relentless hordes of monstrous foes. Unleash the true power of a Viking warrior as you slay enemies, learn potent skills, and forge your own path to victory.

FEATURES


  • Three game modes: survivors, roguelike and infinite
  • Unlock new characters and power ups
  • Collect materials to upgrade your viking warrior
  • Endless replayability
  • World ranking
  • Play using mouse and keyboard or controller

THREE GAME MODES


Survivors mode: Survive 30 minutes fighting against relentless hordes of thousands of monsters and defeat the final boss.



Roguelike mode: Sail across the sea, facing numerous foes and events on your journey. The content is generated procedurally, each run is unique.



Infinite mode: Survive as long as you can! Battle against unyielding waves of countless monsters. Every 10 minutes, a boss appears.

DYNAMIC BUILDS


Craft your own destiny with dynamic builds that ensure no two attempts are alike. Mix and match characters, weapons, and upgrades to design the most formidable Viking warrior. Strategize and adapt to the ever-changing challenges, creating powerful combinations to decimate your enemies.

ENDLESS REPLAYABILITY


Viking Survivors beckons with endless replayability. Test your skills, challenge your limits, and strive for higher scores. Each playthrough is a unique adventure, offering a fresh and exhilarating experience every time you step into the fray.

PLAY YOUR WAY


Whether you prefer the precision of a mouse and keyboard or the familiarity of a controller, Viking Survivors accommodates your play style. Immerse yourself in the action, feeling the weight of every swing and the thrill of each victory.



Unleash the Viking within, embrace the challenge, and become a legend in the brutal and captivating world of Viking Survivors!

highlighted.name: Win a run playing as Sven
Win a run playing as Bjorn
Win a run playing as Ragnar
Win a run in Midgard (Survivors Mode)
Win a run in Muspelheim (Survivors Mode)

Win a run on medium difficulty (Survivors Mode)
Win a run on hard difficulty (Survivors Mode)
Win a run on easy difficulty (Roguelike Mode)

name: Viking Survivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Embark on an epic journey through the realms of Viking Survivors, a heart-pounding action roguelite that pits you against relentless hordes of monstrous foes. Unleash the true power of a Viking warrior as you slay enemies, learn potent skills, and forge your own path to victory.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Catalan
